items.sentence: Tom opened the envelope, took out the letter, and started reading it.
On crowded buses, young people should give their seats to old people.
You know how hard it would be to sell something like that, don't you?
I wouldn't have asked you to come if it weren't absolutely necessary.
There is nothing worse than doing something in a half-hearted manner.
Can I talk to you for just a second about what happened in Australia?
The color of this stratum stands out from the rest of the cliff face.
White wine should be drunk chilled, and red wine at room temperature.
Tom used to be the fastest runner in our class, but he isn't anymore.
Tom and Mary dated each other for about three months a few years ago.
